definition: to do something to sb/to deal with/to cope/how?/to no avail
how can one help
surname He
what/how/why/which/carry
have no way out/have no alternative/abbr. to 無奈|无奈[wu2 nai4]
to have no alternative/to be helpless
see 無可奈何|无可奈何[wu2 ke3 nai4 he2]

sentences.english: How did Mary make most of her money?
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗全豹的錢是奈何賺到的？

sentences.english: Assuming it rains this morning- what shall we do?
sentences.chinese: 假設本日下午下雨的話我們奈何辦？

sentences.english: The master could do nothing but set both the slave and the lion free.
sentences.chinese: 主人莫可奈何，只好放了奴隸和獅子一條生路。

sentences.english: Try because he did. he couldn't finish the task successfully.
sentences.chinese: 不論奈何勤苦，他都不能利市地完成那個任務。

sentences.english: Take mightiness of unwilling, but again can have no option ground to fall in chips.
sentences.chinese: 似帶着強烈的不甘，卻又只能無可奈何地破碎。

sentences.english: My neighbors and I shook our heads and fumed.
sentences.chinese: 鄰居們和我一樣，憤怒地搖頭，卻無可奈何。

sentences.english: I missed the regular bus, so I had to go to work on foot.
sentences.chinese: 趕上班車，沒奈何只好步行去上班。

sentences.english: I want to be the guardians of the helpless bridge so I can accompany you through.
sentences.chinese: 我要做奈何橋的守護者這樣我就可以陪你渡過。

sentences.english: Although difficult to breach destiny, but since someone always illegal.
sentences.chinese: 天命雖難違，奈何總有人要違。

sentences.english: Taoists maintain a negative and helpless attitude toward man's fate.
sentences.chinese: 道家對人之命運持一種自然的無可奈何的態度。

sentences.english: However, no benefit is unfaithful minister, the official fiscal few more, nothing?
sentences.chinese: 然無利則臣不忠，官多財寡，奈何？

sentences.english: Standing on the helpless bridge, see you shengshengshishi samsara.
sentences.chinese: 站在奈何橋，看邇生生世世輪迴。

sentences.english: But how many people know and discerning for?
sentences.chinese: 奈何又有多少人身心雪亮知其因？

sentences.english: Take on a victim mentality and there is nothing you can do about your life.
sentences.chinese: 保持一份受害者的心態並且堅定自己對生活無可奈何。

sentences.english: However, the "aqua regia" to titanium was no alternative.
sentences.chinese: 然而，“王水”對鈦卻無可奈何。

definition: even if/even though
even if/even though

(indicates that sth turns out just the opposite of what one would wish) unfortunately/as it happened/(indicates that sth is the opposite of what would be normal or reasonable) stubbornly/contrarily/against reason/(indicates that sb or a group is singled out) precisely/only/of all people
it is a pity/what a pity/unfortunately
have no way out/have no alternative/abbr. to 無奈|无奈[wu2 nai4]
in the end/after all is said and done
helpless/without choice/for lack of better option/grudgingly/willy-nilly/nolens volens/abbr. for 無可奈何|无可奈何[wu2 ke3 nai4 he2]
to suffer from (a disadvantage)
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
no strategy left to try (idiom); at one's wit's end/at the end of one's tether/powerless
although/even though
to have no alternative but to/to be obliged to
though/although
to see with one's own eyes/very soon
to stop/to obstruct
to have a mind to/to intend to/deliberately/considerate
